summary.span: 命名空間包含支援 Visual Basic 之 Visual Basic 執行階段的類型。

span.span: The namespace contains types that support the Visual Basic Runtime in Visual Basic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需 Visual Basic 執行階段的語言元件的詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 語言參考](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/index.md)。For more information about the language elements in the Visual Basic Runtime, see [Visual Basic Language Reference](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/index.md).
